result.title: {ASTRAL-III: polynomial time species tree reconstruction from partially resolved gene trees}
result.value:
@article{zhang2018astral3,
    doi = {10.1186/s12859-018-2129-y},
    pages = {153},
    number = {Suppl 6},
    volume = {19},
    journal = {BMC Bioinformatics},
    year = {2018},
    title = {{ASTRAL-III: polynomial time species tree reconstruction from partially resolved gene trees}},
    author = {C. Zhang and M. Rabiee and E. Sayyari and S. Mirarab},
}
Species tree estimation from multi-copy gene trees

[FastMulRFS](https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btaa444) is a pipeline for estimating species trees from multi-copy gene trees, based on the Robinson-Foulds supertree problem for MUL-trees ([MulRF](https://doi.org/10.1186/1748-7188-8-28)). See this [example](example/README.md).

result.description: * Updates unroot trees function to handle the case where the tree is rooted on a terminal edge. Note that this only impacts pre-processing when the input MUL-trees are *not* already unrooted.
result.name: FastMulRFS v1.2.0

result.description:
+ No longer uses *deroot* function from TreeSwift, as this function does not *unroot* the tree. Instead, a custom function is used to unroot trees. Note that this only impacts pre-processing when the input MUL-trees are not already unrooted.
+ Includes tests.
result.name: FastMulRFS v1.1.0

result.description: This release is the first release of scripts for estimating species trees with the FastMulRFS pipeline.
result.name: First release

result.value:
+ Python 3
+ [DendroPy](https://www.dendropy.org) if using [version 1](https://github.com/ekmolloy/fastmulrfs/blob/master/python-tools/preprocess_multrees_v1.py)
+ [TreeSwift](https://github.com/niemasd/TreeSwift) if using [version 2](https://github.com/ekmolloy/fastmulrfs/blob/master/python-tools/preprocess_multrees_v2.py) or [version 3](https://github.com/ekmolloy/fastmulrfs/blob/master/python-tools/preprocess_multrees_v3.py) (recommended)
